short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make clicking more satisfying one click at a time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Satisfying Clicks adds fun, customizable click animations to your browser! Personalize the effects to suit your style and make each click more enjoyable. No complicated setup: it just works out of the box.

Ready to make your browsing more fun? Satisfying Clicks is about to make your browser experience that little bit more satisfying. Ready? Then go install it!
